content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (15, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (15, 21)
- Boiler at position (14, 20)
- Offshore Pump at position (13, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (25, 35)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 36) and a Furnace at position (26, 36)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 37) and a Furnace at position (26, 37)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 38) and a Furnace at position (26, 38)

### Iron Plate Mine at Position (30, 45)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (30, 46) and a Furnace at position (31, 46)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (30, 47) and a Furnace at position (31, 47)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (40, 50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40, 51) and a Furnace at position (41, 51)
- Assembling Machine at position (42, 52) and Inserter at position (41, 52) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup connecting the Furnace at position (41, 51) to the Assembling Machine at position (42, 52)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with Incorrect API Usage
- Review the API documentation to ensure correct function calls and parameters are used.

### Errors with Misaligned Conveyor Belts
- Double-check the alignment of conveyor belts to ensure they connect properly between entities.
